title: PBE website sign up not working?
body: Hey everyone! I recently tried applying to the PBE sign up page from League of Legends stream and I got an error message 500 with a Blitzcrank on the screen. Can anyone help me out?

replies.body:
This typically happens if there's an issue with your route to that specific page. I recommend utilizing a VPN (Virtual Private Network) to bypass this. Check out [Hotspot Shield](https://www.hotspotshield.com/) or [Cyberghost](http://www.cyberghostvpn.com/) for this.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
